1065518829202284545.text:
Addressing #climatechange was always about politics.  
But when politics is this broken, #climatebreakdown is all-but-inevitablehttps://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1065400254151954432 …

1065521311680745472.text:
I think #climatechange is one of a suite of environmental issues we are facing. Human-influenced:
- biodiversity loss &extinctions
- water &food security
- green transport
- finite fossil fuel dependence
By lumping all environmental issues into the 1st, do we weaken our argument?

1065520012444745728.text: What an appalling eejit he is.

1065546964090146821.text: Maybe. I see climate change as (extremely dangerous) symptom of a system built on an ideology of consumption, pollution & exploitation that is running amok. Perhaps it will turn out to be the 'natural check' on our fantasy of endless growth?
